name: Create a Weekly Responsive Plex Media Newsletter via Email (Tautulli Alternative)
description:
üì¨ Plex Recently Added ‚Üí Responsive Email Newsletter (Tautulli Alternative)

What it is

This workflow automatically creates a weekly Plex newsletter that highlights recently added Movies & TV Shows. It‚Äôs designed to be mobile-friendly and Gmail/iOS Mail compatible, making it easy to share Plex updates with friends, family, or your community.

How it works
	‚Ä¢	‚è∞ Runs on a weekly schedule (customizable).
	‚Ä¢	üé¨ Fetches recently added Movies & TV Shows from Tautulli API.
	‚Ä¢	üì∞ Builds a responsive HTML newsletter that works in Gmail, iOS Mail, and most clients.
	‚Ä¢	üìß Sends one personalized email per recipient via SMTP.
	‚Ä¢	üóíÔ∏è Every node has a Sticky Note explaining setup and purpose.

How to set up
	1.	Replace the placeholders in the nodes with your own details:
	‚Ä¢	YOUR_TAUTULLI_URL
	‚Ä¢	YOUR_API_KEY
	‚Ä¢	YOUR_PLEX_TOKEN
	‚Ä¢	YOUR_PLEX_SERVER_ID
	2.	Update the recipient list in Prepare Emails for Recipients.
	3.	Add your SMTP credentials in Send Newsletter Emails.
	4.	(Optional) Customize the HTML/CSS in Generate HTML Newsletter.

Requirements
	‚Ä¢	Plex Media Server with Tautulli installed.
	‚Ä¢	SMTP account (Gmail, custom domain, etc.).

Customization
	‚Ä¢	Change the schedule to daily/weekly as needed.
	‚Ä¢	Edit the HTML template for your own branding.
	‚Ä¢	Extend with additional nodes (Discord, Slack, etc.).

‚∏ª

‚ö° Workflow Overview:

``‚è∞ Schedule Trigger ‚Üí üé¨ Fetch Movies ‚Üí üì∫ Fetch TV ‚Üí üîó Merge ‚Üí üì∞ Build HTML ‚Üí üìß Prepare Recipients ‚Üí üì§ Send ‚Üí ‚úÖ Finish
``

data.details: The Code node allows you to execute JavaScript in your workflow.

parameters.content:
### ‚è∞ Schedule Trigger
Runs weekly (Friday 08:00). Adjust day/hour to your liking.

### üé¨ Fetch Recent Movies (Tautulli)
Replace placeholders in the URL: `YOUR_TAUTULLI_URL`, `YOUR_API_KEY`.

### üì∫ Fetch Recent TV Shows (Tautulli)
Replace placeholders in the URL: `YOUR_TAUTULLI_URL`, `YOUR_API_KEY`.

### üîó Merge
Just combines Movies (input 1) and TV (input 2) before building the email.

### üì∞ Build HTML Newsletter
Edit the code and set:
- `YOUR_TAUTULLI_URL`
- `YOUR_PLEX_TOKEN`
- `YOUR_PLEX_SERVER_ID`
Everything else is template-safe.

### üìß Prepare Recipients
Replace the example emails below with your list.

### üì§ Send via SMTP
Set `fromEmail` and attach your SMTP credentials in this node.

### ‚úÖ Finish
Tiny summary of how many emails were sent.

parameters.jsCode: const sent = $input.all().length;\nreturn [{ json: { status: 'OK', sentCount: sent, note: 'Newsletter sent successfully' } }];
